ygData.subject: Re: How addicted??
ygData.msgSnippet: NEARLY 28 HOURS STRAIGHT???? That s great!! My poor record is only 8 hours. Wow, you have an understanding fiancee-- or, maybe by this time HAD should be
ygData.messageBody:
NEARLY 28 HOURS STRAIGHT???? That's great!! My
poor record is only 8 hours. Wow, you have an
understanding fiancee-- or, maybe by this time "HAD" should be
used?? hehe<br><br>I'm glad to hear that the game still
has a strong pull for those who have high level
characters. I've heard that some people burn out at/about lvl
30. I know some people that have a stagnant lvl 30ish
char (or 2) and who constantly play new characters
instead. I hope to get one or two chars to lvl 60, but I
don't see that happening for a LONG time!!!
<br><br>Play on my friends, play on.....<br><br>Xela
Orcbane<br>Druid of the 20th tree ring<br>Xev
